resources.string: In this game you are a runner who\'s trying to buy a new pair of shoes. You go for runs to earn coins, and use those coins to buy a pair of shoes. You can also buy upgrades with the coins, which allows you to earn more coins per run. Happy running!
Your coins and upgrades have been set to 0.
You need 1,000,000 coins to buy the shoes.
Congradulations, you\'ve won! With lots of effort and perseverence, you\'ve managed to collect 1,000,000 coins. Now you can buy that new pair of shoes you\'ve always wanted.
